class.name: com.simplysoftware.HoneywellMobilityEnhanced.HoneywellMobilityEnhanced
class.comment: B4A SDK Wrapper for Honeywell Barcode Readers (Aidc SDK) Based on Android Data Collection Java API V1.97.00.0084

method.name: EnableLogging
method.comment: Enables or disables library logging for debugging purposes. Enabled true to enable logging, false to disable.

method.name: Notify
method.comment:
Triggers a pre-configured notification for the user. You must have a BarcodeReader instance that is claimed and available.
NotificationType The type of notification to trigger. Accepted values are: "GOOD_READ_NOTIFICATION" or "BAD_READ_NOTIFICATION".

method.name: GetScannerSerialNumber
method.comment: Retrieves the serial number as a string, or null if not available.

method.name: GetAllProperties
method.comment: Retrieves a Map of all properties currently set on the claimed BarcodeReader. Return all properties, or an empty Map on error.

method.name: SelectScannerByFriendlyName
method.comment:
Selects a specific barcode scanner to use by its friendly name. It searches for a connected scanner with a matching friendly name and then establishes a new connection to it.
friendlyName: The friendly name of the scanner to select, e.g., "imager", "scanner", "hf_rfid_reader". This is case-sensitive.

method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Checks if the library is fully initialized and able to communicate with the device. True if ready for use, false otherwise.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initializes the Honeywell Mobility library for barcode scanners. This will automatically claims a barcode scanner if one is availiable.

method.name: IsClaimed
method.comment: Checks if the barcode reader is currently claimed by this application. Returns true if the scanner is claimes, false otherwise.

method.name: SetEventPrefix
method.comment: Sets a custom event prefix for the library's events. Change the prefix initialize event name string to a new prefix event name string.

method.name: ListScanners
method.comment:
Lists the technical names of all connected barcode scanners. These names are unique identifiers required for the `createBarcodeReaderConnection` method.
Return A list of strings containing the technical names of connected scanners.

method.name: ManageTrigger
method.comment: Enable or disable manually controlling the trigger and how it works, default is false. True if you the developer wants to manage the trigger, false if not (leave automatic). When true, the TriggerChanged event will be triggered

method.name: OnDestroy
method.comment: Cleans up and releases all resources associated with the scanner. Use this method when your application is about to be shut down.

method.name: GetSymbologyStates
method.comment:
Retrieves the state (enabled/disabled) of a list of common symbologies.
This function gets all current properties from the scanner and checks the state of a predefined list of common symbologies.
A List of strings where each element is a symbology name followed by its state, e.g. "Code 128: Enabled". Returns an empty list if the scanner is not ready.

method.name: OnResume
method.comment: Reclaims the scanner when the application resumes from the background.

method.name: GetConnectionStatus
method.comment: Retrieves a formatted connection status of the barcode. Return Connected if the scanner is connected, Disconnected if disconnected, or Unknown if the status is unknown.

method.name: GetConnectedScannerName
method.comment: Gets the friendly name of the currently connected barcode scanner. Returns the scanner's name as a string, or an empty string if none is connected.

method.name: GetScannerFirmwareVersion
method.comment: Retrieves the scanner's firmware version. The firmware version as a string, or null if not available.

method.name: ListAvailableScanners
method.comment: Return a list of friendly names for all available barcode scanners.

method.name: StartScan
method.comment: Initiates a software trigger to start a scan.

method.name: Symbologies
method.comment:
Use this symbology list with SetSymbologyEnabled > Symbology As String.
1D Symbologies: UPC A, UPC E, EAN 8, EAN 13, CODE 39, CODE 128, GS1 128, INTERLEAVED 25, CODABAR, MSI, RSS
2D Symbologies: QR CODE, DATAMATRIX, PDF 417, AZTEC, MAXICODE

method.name: GetScannerId
method.comment: Retrieves the scanner ID as a string, or null if not available.

method.name: ClaimScanner
method.comment: Claims control of the barcode reader, allowing the application to use it. This is automatically handled internally but can be called manually if needed.

method.name: IsScannerReady
method.comment: Checks if the scanner is ready for use, including being connected and available. This is a more robust check than simply verifying the barcodeReader object is not null. True if the scanner is ready for use, false otherwise.

method.name: ClearScanHistory
method.comment: Clears the locally stored history of scanned barcodes. This will reset the list of the last 50 scanned barcodes that is maintained by the wrapper.

method.name: OnPause
method.comment: Releases the scanner claim when the application is paused.

method.name: GetBarcodeReaderInfo
method.comment: This method retrieves information about the last connected barcode reader and returns its properties as a Map.

method.name: SetSoftwareTriggerState
method.comment: Programmatically triggers the scanner. True to start a scan, False to stop it.

method.name: SetIlluminationEnabled
method.comment: Enables or disables the scanner illumination. True to turn on the illumination, False to turn it off.

method.name: GetScanHistory
method.comment: Retrieves the locally stored history of scanned barcodes. An array of strings containing the last 50 history of scanned barcodes.

method.name: ReleaseScanner
method.comment: Releases the barcode reader, allowing other applications to claim it.

method.name: SetTriggerScanMode
method.comment:
Sets the scan mode of the trigger.
This allows you to configure the desired scan mode as a string. Accepted values are: "continuous", "oneShot", "readOnRelease".

method.name: SetGoodReadNotification
method.comment: Enables or disables the good read notification sound/vibration. True to enable, False to disable.

method.name: CaptureLastScannedImage
method.comment: Captures and returns the last scanned bitmap image. This method raises the OnImageCaptured event with the captured image or OnImageCaptureFailed if the capture is unsuccessful.

method.name: SetSymbologyEnabled
method.comment: Enables or disables a specific symbology for the barcode reader. Symbology: The name of the symbology (e.g., BarcodeReader.PROPERTY_CODE_128_ENABLED). Enabled: True to enable the symbology, false to disable.

method.name: SetAimerEnabled
method.comment: Enables or disables the scanner aimer. True to turn on the aimer, False to turn it off.

method.name: StopScan
method.comment: Stops the software trigger, ending an active scan.

method.name: ConnectToScanner
method.comment:
Connects to a specific barcode scanner by its technical name. Use the name returned from ListScanners().
ScannerName: The name of the scanner device to connect to. e.g., "DW-Scanner", "imager", etc.

method.name: GetProperty
method.comment:
Retrieves the value of a single scanner property. e.g. "PROPERTY_EAN_13_ENABLED", "PROPERTY_DECODER_TIMEOUT", "PROPERTY_ILLUMINATION_MODE". CHECK THE SCANNER MANUAL FOR THE FULL LIST OF PROPERTIES.
propertyName: The name of the property to retrieve. Return the value of the property as an Object, or null if the property is not found

method.name: SetBadReadNotification
method.comment: Enables or disables the bad read notification sound/vibration. True to enable, False to disable.

method.name: ResetScannerToDefaults
method.comment: Resets the barcode scanner's properties back to their default initialization values.

method.name: SetProperty
method.comment:
Sets the value of a single scanner property, e.g. "PROPERTY_EAN_13_ENABLED", "PROPERTY_DECODER_TIMEOUT", "PROPERTY_ILLUMINATION_MODE". CHECK THE SCANNER MANUAL FOR THE FULL LIST OF PROPERTIES.
propertyName: The name of the property to retrieve. propertyValue: Sets the property value, Boolean, Int, String.

method.name: SetDecoderTimeout
method.comment: Sets the maximum time (in milliseconds) the scanner will attempt to decode a barcode. The timeout value in milliseconds.

field.name: QROpenBrowser
field.comment: Automatically open the brower if the scanned QR image is a URL.

field.name: QR_ENABLED
field.comment: Enabled/Disable state of QR code symbology.
